amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that encourages the Department of Justice to appeal the decision in United States v. Helder, Jr. and aggressively continue to track down and prosecute sex offenders on the Internet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to condemn the decision in United States v. Helder, Jr. and encourage the Department of Justice to appeal the decision so that it is overturned.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryun (KS) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
